If the value of property was not specified, value will be compared to this parameter.
member.returns: The value of , if value equals property value (or parameter, if Argument is not specified); otherwise,

member.summary: Specifies whether the comparison should be inverted.

member.summary: An optional parameter that can be passed to the converter.
member.remarks: If specified, the comparison will be made against this value. Otherwise, the comparison will be made against the property value specified in the binding.

member.name: T:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager
member.summary:
Stores timestamp values locally for the last received items as key-value pairs where the key is the persistenceId representing the provider that generated the item, and value is the actual timestamp.
Next time when the application starts and is called, only items newer than the stored timestamp values will be marked as unread.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._persistanceKey
member.summary: Stores the persistance key for timestamps storage.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._LastItemTimeStampDictionary
member.summary: Keeps last timelineitem timestamp per provider as were saved at last application close.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._CurrentLastItemTimeStampDictionary
member.summary: Keeps last loaded timelineitem timestamp for saving at application close.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._PluginPersistenceId
member.summary: Stores persistence id as string for the plugin.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._StorageService
member.summary: Stores a reference to StorageService as used by the plugin.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._KeyValueSeparator
member.summary: Stores the string that separates key from value in stored string.

member.name: F:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager._PairsSeparator
member.summary: Stores the string that separates different key-value pairs in stored string.

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.LastItemTimestampManager.#ctor(System.Guid,Seesmic.Sdp.Extensibility.IStorageService)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Persistence id for the plugin that instantiates the manager.
Reference to storage service as used by the plugin.

member.summary: Gets the last timestamp for a specific id.
member.param: The id for which to get the last timestamp.
member.returns: The last timestamp for a specific id.

member.summary: Tries to set a new last timestamp for a specific id. Checks before if the value is bigger than the existing one
member.param: The id for which to set the last timestamp.
The timestamp which is set.

member.summary: Saves timestamp values of the last items through StorageService.

member.name: T:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.CollectionTracker
member.summary: Used to track observable or non-observable collections.

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.CollectionTracker.Track``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Action{``0},System.Action{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tracks item add and remove changes that occur to the specified collection and executes the appropriate actions.
member.typeparam: The type of items in the collection.
member.param: The collection to track for changes.
The action that is executed when an item is added to the collection.
The action that is executed when an item is removed from the collection.
If set to true, the collection is enumerated and the onItemAdded action is executed for each item, when this method is called.
member.returns: An object which, when disposed, will restore the collection to its initial state (the state before tracking was performed).

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.CollectionTracker.Track``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Action{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tracks item add changes that occur to the specified collection and executes the appropriate action.
member.typeparam: The type of items in the collection.
member.param: The collection to track for changes.
The action that is executed when an item is added to the collection.
If set to true, the collection is enumerated and the onItemAdded action is executed for each item, when this method is called.
member.returns: An object which, when disposed, will restore the collection to its initial state (the state before tracking was performed).

member.name: T:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.FastObservableCollection`1
member.summary: Extends standard observable collection with fast methods for adding data.
member.typeparam: The type of items in the collection.

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.FastObservableCollection`1.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Adds a range of items at the end of the collection.
member.param: The items to add at the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.FastObservableCollection`1.OnCollectionChanged(System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs)
member.remarks: The event is only raised if was not previously called or after the object returned by it is disposed.

member.name: M:Seesmic.Sdp.Utils.FastObservableCollection`1.DeferRefresh
member.summary: Calling this method disables refreshing the UI when changes in the colection occur.
member.returns: An object which, when disposed, re-enables refreshing the UI when changes in the colection occur.
member.remarks: Use this method in a using block when a collection changes rapidly in a short period of time, so that the UI will not have to be refreshed on every collection change.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3
member.summary: Implements a weak event listener that allows the owner to be garbage collected if its only remaining link is an event handler.
member.typeparam: Type of rootInstance listening for the event.
Type of source for the event.
Type of event arguments for the event.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3._weakInstance
member.summary: WeakReference to the rootInstance listening for the event.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3._weakSource
member.summary: To hold a reference to source object. With this instance the WeakEventListener can guarantee that the handler gets unregistered when listener is released.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3._onEventAction
member.summary: Delegate to the method to call when the event fires.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3._onDetachAction
member.summary: Delegate to the method to call when detaching from the event.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3.#ctor(`0,`1)
member.summary: Initializes a new instances of the WeakEventListener class.
member.param: Instance subscribing to the event.
Source object instance.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3.OnEvent(System.Object,`2)
member.summary: Handler for the subscribed event calls OnEventAction to handle it.
member.param: Event source.
Event arguments.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3.Detach
member.summary: Detaches from the subscribed event.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3.OnEventAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the method to call when the event fires.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.WeakEventListener`3.OnDetachAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the method to call when detaching from the event.
